Key Match Events: Nicolas Otamendi seals it, Argentina moves on!
Miscellaneous Highlights: This time, it was Nicolas Otamendi who clinched yet another dramatic penalty shootout victory for Argentina.
Others: Argentina took a 2-0 penalties lead on Alexis Mac Allister's penalty strike.
Neither team made their first penalty thanks to yet another clutch save from Emiliano Martinez.
Lionel Messi sent Ecuador's goalkeeper flying, but his shot stunningly went off the top of the post.
